education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering, Minor in Data Science

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

experience.title: Software Engineer (Distributed Systems)
details: Designed and implemented globally available distributed systems using AWS technologies, improving system availability by 99.9%
Developed Linux-based software solutions with containerized deployment using Docker, reducing deployment time by 30%
Implemented TCP/IP networking protocols for distributed applications, enhancing communication efficiency by 25%
Led the adoption of continuous integration practices using Jenkins, reducing integration issues by 40%
Mentored junior engineers in software development best practices and distributed systems architecture

experience.title: Software Engineer (Cloud Services)
details: Developed distributed cloud-based services and APIs for financial transactions processing 30M+ daily transactions
Implemented object-oriented design patterns to create scalable microservices architecture
Optimized network protocols including TCP/IP and QoS algorithms for high-volume transaction processing
Designed and executed comprehensive test strategies across multiple environments, improving test coverage by 35%
Collaborated with security engineering teams to implement robust network security measures

experience.title: Software Developer (Embedded Systems)
details: Developed Linux-based embedded software solutions for enterprise applications
Implemented real-time operating system (RTOS) concepts in system design
Conducted systems integration testing for wireless network protocols
Participated in full software development life cycle including code reviews and CI/CD processes
Assisted in developing software defined network components

projects.name: Distributed Cloud Networking System
details: Designed and implemented a distributed cloud networking system using AWS technologies and Docker containers
Implemented TCP/IP protocol stack optimizations that improved network throughput by 40%
Developed Linux-based services for network monitoring and QoS management
Created automated deployment pipelines that reduced service deployment time from hours to minutes

projects.name: Embedded Network Protocol Simulator
details: Developed a simulation environment for testing embedded network protocols including IPv6 and 802.11 standards
Implemented RTOS-like scheduling algorithms for protocol processing
Created test automation framework that reduced testing time by 60%
Integrated with continuous integration pipeline for automated regression testing
